executeOnAddress

public boolean executeOnAddress(XRI3Segment targetAddress,
                                Operation operation,
                                MessageResult messageResult,
                                ExecutionContext executionContext)
                         throws Xdi2MessagingException
Description copied from interface: AddressHandler
Executes an XDI operation on an address.

Specified by:
executeOnAddress in interface AddressHandler
Parameters:
targetAddress - The target address.
operation - The operation that is being executed.
messageResult - The message result to fill.
executionContext - An "execution context" object for the entire XDI message envelope.
Returns:
True, if the operation has been handled.
Throws:
Xdi2MessagingException
